entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
